issue.title: [Gandiva] Sync remaining commits from gandiva repo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3384](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3384). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After initial merge some new commits were done in gandiva, we need to port them to the arrow repo.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3384?focusedCommentId=16643530) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This has been completed
